items.sentence: The opening ceremony of the Olympics has already begun.
Tom said a lot of things about Mary that weren\'t true.
Tom is the kind of guy lots of people just don\'t like.
He\'s somewhat hard of hearing, so please speak louder.
Tom and Mary won\'t be able see each other for a while.
I give you my permission to do whatever you want to do.
I guess after so many beers Tom is probably very drunk.
I had difficulty in making myself understood in French.
I used to write in my diary every day when I was young.
Tom wasn\'t ready to accept Mary\'s love or friendship.
Do you remember what happened here on October 20, 2013?
Do you think that eating with your family is important?
Tom was the only one who didn\'t laugh at Mary\'s joke.
I\'d like to rent your most inexpensive car for a week.
I\'m not saying what she did was the right thing to do.
I\'m not sure why Tom is being blamed for the accident.
Do you think you would ever consider going out with me?
Tom said I don\'t need to do anything I don\'t want to.

Tom had plenty of chances to apologize, but he didn\'t.
